Name: [Critical] Sawn-Off Shotgun
Desc: All squad members gain <color=#2BAD00>1</color> stack of Insight upon entering the battlefield. Agents <color=#2BAD00>no longer lose</color> Insight stacks when attacked.
Desc2: It packs a punch but is small and convenient to carry. You can even keep it in your waistband. (There are over 200 accidental discharge incidents each year for this very reason)
